Municipal Court
---------------

### [Municipal Court](https://iowapark.com/deparment/municipal-court)

* [News](https://iowapark.com/news/department/municipal-court/)
* [Events](https://iowapark.com/tribe_events_departments/municipal-court/)
* [Employees](https://iowapark.com/employees_departments/municipal-court/)
* [Faqs](https://iowapark.com/faqs_departments/municipal-court/)
* [Galleries](https://iowapark.com/galleries_departments/municipal-court/)
* [Documents](https://iowapark.com/documents_departments/municipal-court/)
* [Links](https://iowapark.com/links_departments/municipal-court/)

The Iowa Park Municipal Court is held in the City Council Chambers at 103 E. Cash St.

Court Dates are the 2nd and 4th Tuesday of each month at 9:00 am depending on your scheduled court date.

Please click on the link and review the Municipal Court dress code before attending court.  [Dress\_Code](https://iowapark.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/Dress_Code.pdf)

The Municipal Court Clerk’s office is located in City Hall, 103 N. Wall St.  The Municipal Court Clerk, Sara Rangel, can be reached calling (940) 213-7133 or by email:  e-mail srangel@iowapark.com.

The City of Iowa Park Municipal Court Judge is Dan Tompkins and he can be reached during normal Municipal Court scheduled dates.
